This is multiple dimensions beginning to crash into each other. VENTS: Miles and Peter listen. Miles growing very nervous Peter noticing.  62.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: (reassuring) --This is pretty standard Spider- Man stakes, you get used to it. Watch this, he’s going to say ‘you've got 24 hours!’

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN
dialogues.text: You've got twenty-four hours.

dialogues.speaker: HEAD SCIENTIST
dialogues.text: What this means is that there could be a rupture in the space time continuum.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Oooh, that’s bad. Actually everything she said was bad, I was lying before. --The group below is EXITING. As they do Peter SPRINGS IN

dialogues.speaker: ACTION--
dialogues.text: --Peter climbs out of the air vent and smoothly crawls up down along a ceiling duct and jumps down. He starts hacki into the scientist’s computer. He hears her off-screen talking to Fisk.

dialogues.speaker: HEAD SCIENTIST, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: OK hold on, let me show you some more data-- Peter looks back, sees Miles out of the vent.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: What’re you doing, bud? Miles exerts himself, trying to unstick. He shakes his he

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: I can’t move!

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: OK, relax your fingers! We don’t have time. Just “let go,” be in the moment !

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: --I am in the moment, it’s a terrible moment!-- CUT OUTSIDE TO Kingpin and the Head Scientist.  63.

dialogues.speaker: HEAD SCIENTIST
dialogues.text: I’m not refusing--

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN
dialogues.text: No more excuses!

dialogues.speaker: HEAD SCIENTIST
dialogues.text: --I just need more time. CUT BACK INSIDE TO MILES.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: They're right there, they’re going to see you! Miles, you gotta unstick. What do you do to relax?

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Relax. Okay... Beat. Miles begins to sing his song from the opening.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Oh, for crying out loud. Miles starts humming to himself. He unsticks a finger. Th another. Starts to move his hands. --The rest of MILES’ fingers come unstuck and Miles start FALL. Miles and the metal duct CRASH TO THE GROUND with a huge CLANG!

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Teenagers, just the worst-- SEQ. 2400 - ALCHEMAX LABS “ACL”

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter's spider-sense motivates him to look at the door’s window, through which he sees the Head Scientist TURN BAC HER OFFICE, having heard the crash.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: --Miles? Where did you go? He’s nowhere to be seen. But we can hear him. They contin to WHISPER-YELL.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: (invisible) I'm right here.  64.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Where? I can’t see you.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: (invisible) I’m right in front of you. Can Spider-Man turn invisible?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Not in my universe.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Ow! You just poked me in my eye!

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: (marveling) This is incredible-- some kind of fight or flight thing.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: What’s that? The Head Scientist WALKS TOWARD HER OFFICE to INVESTIGATE Peter turns, suddenly in a PANIC--

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: --Remember this password!: Dgfampesand4$35876534545435-—

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Slow down, Peter! I-- I need to write it down!

dialogues.speaker: PETER MILES, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (smoothes hair under --How do I do that?!-- mask) --and download the schematic--

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: --While I turn on the charm. The Head Scientist walks into her office to see Spider-Ma STANDING “CASUALLY” with his arm on her desk and a METAL dented in the MIDDLE OF THE FLOOR.

dialogues.speaker: HEAD SCIENTIST
dialogues.text: Spider-Man?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Oh, hey. Didn't see you there...  65.

dialogues.speaker: HEAD SCIENTIST
dialogues.text: Wow. Okay I’m kinda freaking out right now. I mean, you're supposed to be dead.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Surprise!-- The Head Scientist suddenly pulls up Spidey's mask--

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Whoa!--OK that's a no-no, we don’t like that-- --revealing Peter's face. ON THE HEAD SCIENTIST, she GASPS. She quickly appraises h up and down, now LASER FOCUSSED--.

dialogues.speaker: HEAD SCIENTIST
dialogues.text: This is fascinating. She snaps on a latex glove and grabs Peter’s face.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: --OK, that’s m’face--

dialogues.speaker: HEAD SCIENTIST
dialogues.text: An entirely different Peter Parker. The Head Scientist BENDS DOWN to poke Peter’s STOMACH. Be her we see semi-visible Miles running around, confused. Peter’s eyes WIDEN -- he’s gonna be caught! HEAD SCIENTIST (CONT’D) OK, a little bit of a gut, perhaps from dimensional warping.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Oh yeah, yeah, yeah. I was way flatter before I warped. Miles ARRIVES AT THE COMPUTER and frantically plugs in hi DRIVE, typing the password: Dgfampesand#4$...then...??

dialogues.speaker: HEAD SCIENTIST, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: (to herself) Travel through the multiverse appears to have deteriorated...

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: (to himself) 3454543... Ah what was the rest?! Miles pauses, unsure of the rest. Peter WHISTLES. The Head Scientist LOOKS UP AT PETER IN RESPONSE, a littl

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: (covering) --How old are you? You don’t look a day over 35! Miles types the 35. It WORKS! But then a BAFFLING DESKTOP FULL OF FILES appears.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: (to himself) Organize your desktop, lady! As Peter FRANTICALLY CLOCKS MILES while trying to not be obvious -- The scientist shoves Peter into a chair, hard-

dialogues.speaker: HEAD SCIENTIST
dialogues.text: This might pinch a little. --Mechanical RESTRAINTS strap Peter to the chair.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Ow! Ow, ow! She grabs a TOOL. Advances.

dialogues.speaker: HEAD SCIENTIST
dialogues.text: I know, I just need to get these samples. She jams a tongue depressor in Peter’s mouth.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Yeah, ok. The Head Scientist studies a sample on a slide.

dialogues.speaker: HEAD SCIENTIST
dialogues.text: Wow. Just complete cellular decay. I’ve never seen anything like this. Peter sees a MONITOR AND COMPUTER FLOATING IN THE AIR.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: (whispers) What are you doing?  67.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: (whispers) I’m just taking the whole thing! The Head Scientist turns to look at Peter.

dialogues.speaker: HEAD SCIENTIST
dialogues.text: And obviously you've been glitching.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: (glitching) Glitching? No. Why would you even say that?

dialogues.speaker: HEAD SCIENTIST
dialogues.text: If you stay in this dimension too long, your body’s going to disintegrate. Do you know how painful that would be, Peter Parker?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Uh, I don’t know.

dialogues.speaker: HEAD SCIENTIST
dialogues.text: You can’t imagine. (weirdly intense) And I, for one, can’t wait to watch.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: (long beat) What did you say your name was?

dialogues.speaker: HEAD SCIENTIST
dialogues.text: Doctor Olivia Octavius. OH NO. She takes off her blue glasses and puts on red goggles. Her TENTACLES UNFURL. One TENTACLE grabs Peter b the neck and slams him into the wall. Ladies and gentleme meet this dimensions DOCTOR OCTOPUS.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Can I assume that your friends call you Doc Ock?

dialogues.speaker: HEAD SCIENTIST
dialogues.text: My friends actually call me Liv. (then turning) My enemies call me Doc Ock. Peter shoots a web towards the door control panel, openin the door for Miles to escape through.  68.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: I got this! Run!

dialogues.speaker: DOC OCK
dialogues.text: Who are you talking to? Miles looks down the empty hallway but hesitates leaving Peter behind.

dialogues.speaker: PETER DOC OCK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I got it! Oh, you got it Peter? Miles takes off down the hallway. Peter is repeatedly SLA into the glass walls as Miles runs by him--

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: --I got it handled buddy! Everything is fine! The ALARM BLARES, with RED ALERT LIGHTING--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MILES runs, terrified, carrying the computer. Flashing between visible and invisible like a human strobe light. many emotions swirling his powers can’t tap into just one RUNS INTO A LAB ASSISTANT, turning VISIBLE--

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (FLIES BY IN BACKGROUND)
dialogues.text: Okay this is a little bit bad.

dialogues.speaker: DOC OCK, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Oh, you’re chatty! The Lab Assistant leaps up, freaked -- she sure looks lik GWANDA IN A LAB COAT... Peter and Doc Ock continue fighting through offices and laboratories. It’s, well, let’s let Peter tell us:

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: --And this is the moment that I’m losing the fight. --BOOM! PETER SMASHES through the WALL and lands next to Miles. Peter WINCES IN PAIN. Miles holds up the computer and monitor, shrugs.  69.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Alright, let me tell you the good news. We don’t need the monitor. Peter grabs the monitor, throws it----Peter is already SWINGING OUT THE DOOR. Miles is SHOCKED-- --Then, THROUGH THE DUST we see the ICONIC 4 METALLIC ARM SILHOUETTE of DOC OCK! She EMERGES, towering above.

dialogues.speaker: DOC OCK
dialogues.text: Peter! You didn’t tell me you had an invisible friend! Could you give me that back, young man?

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: --Peter!-—

dialogues.speaker: DOC OCK
dialogues.text: It's proprietary. Her ARM extends to Miles when Peter swings Miles out the door. Peter YANKS HIM THROUGH THE DOOR, shooting ANOTHER WEB to CLOSE THE DOOR in OCK’S FACE! Nice going, Peter! SEQ. 2500 - ESCAPE HUDSON VALLEY “EHV”

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miles and Peter run out of a door and find themselves fac a group of dining SECURITY GUARD GRAD STUDENTS. A beat.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Wow. This’d be a good time to turn invisible.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Yep.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Ok, not going to turn invisible. (then) Selecting a bagel... act super normal... Peter starts to walk past the Buffet SUPER NORMAL (not no at all), helps himself to a bagel... .-».-as he walks. Miles follows. The Security Guard Stude notice--  70.

dialogues.speaker: GRAD STUDENT
dialogues.text: --Spider-Man?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: You know it’s funny I get that a lot.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Hey. Peter trades Miles the bagel for the computer.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Now we do a switchy-switchy. --The students PULL OUT WEAPONRY. Peter GRABS THE COMPUTE As Peter and Miles RUN, the students CHASE!

dialogues.speaker: GRAD STUDENT GRAD STUDENT 2
dialogues.text: Hey! Hands Up! Get back here! Where do you think you're going? He took a bagel!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AS THEY RUN -- Peter takes off one of his WEB-SHOOTERS, throws it to Miles, who struggles to put it on:

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Alright time to swing, just like I taught you!

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: When did you teach me that?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: I didn’t! It’s a little joke for team building! Peter passes a web-shooter THROWS MILES OFF THE DECK, swinging into the forest.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Alright, you ready?

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Of course I’m not ready!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter SWINGS INTO THE TREES, but Miles is FROZEN. He’s ne actually swung before!  71. Miles is a disaster -- TWISTING and FLAILING on his web a GUNFIRE explodes branches and tree trunks around him.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Whoa, whoa, I can’t do this yet!

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Everybody knows that the best way to learn is under intense, life- threatening pressure! Miles fumbles with his web shooter.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: C'mon, c’mon! But he MISSES, TUMBLING to the ground! Guards find him an start SHOOTING. MILES (CONT’D) Uh oh. Miles SPRINTS along the forest floor as Peter swings abov him.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: What are you doing down there?!

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: I run better than I swing!

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: You gotta swing or they’1l catch you! This is what you wanted! Miles hears a BUZZSAW. Doc Ock appears CUTTING DOWN TREES with her mechanical arms.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Uh oh. Miles tries to find purchase with his web shooter but he keeps missing.

dialogues.speaker: DOC OCK, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Come back, little boy! Peter doubles back, yelling advice back at Miles.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Aim with your hips. Look where you want it to hit. Square your shoulders. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don’t forget to follow through. Don’t shoot off your back foot. Miles runs up a tree -- he’s out of runway!

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: That’s too many things!

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Then stop listening to me!

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: That’s the best idea you’ve had all day! 72. Miles leaps off the tree, shoots off a web and.. It CONNE He swings away as Peter knocks down Doc Ock.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Nice Miles! Miles swings onto a branch and swings alongside

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: I’m doing it!

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Good, you're doing it! Double tap to release and thwip it out again. Thwip and--

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Okay. Thwip--

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: --And release. And thwip--

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Thwip-- --We’re actually SEEING THE “THWIPS” ONSCREEN-—

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: --Release.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Thwip. And release.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: You’re a natural.

dialogues.speaker: PETER/MILES
dialogues.text: Thwip. Release. Peter.  73.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Feel the rhythm?

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Woohoo! And release.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Good, Miles! It’s ugly...but they look pretty good. They really do.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: I gotta say, you’re amazing man!

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: We're a little team. Me as the teacher who can still do it. You as the student who can do it just not as good. I’m proud of us! Is there something you want to say to me? Just then, Peter GLITCHES, falling down onto a thick bran

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Peter! Miles crashes onto the branch, grabbing the computer by i power cord. However, the BRANCH BREAKS, causing both to f down, which allows Ock to grab the computer -- They're do for. But then-- --WHOOSH! -- A BLACK and PINK BLUR swings by.

dialogues.speaker: MILES, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What the...

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Who did that? In mid-air we see a mysterious girl in a HOODIE and BALLE SHOES dispatches Doc Ock while WEBBING Peter and Miles to safety. She lands, with Miles and Peter in embarrassing positions She DE-MASKS.

dialogues.speaker: WANDA
dialogues.text: (to Miles) Hey guys.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: (shocked) Gwanda?  74.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: It's Gwen, actually.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Oh, you know her? Very cool.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: I'm from another dimension. I mean, another, another dimension. SEQ. 2545 - GWEN’S FLASHBACK “GFB”

dialogues.speaker: GWEN, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Alright people. Let’s start at the beginning one last time. My name is Gwen Stacy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We intercut Spider-Gwen (aka-Gwanda) battling THE LIZARD (vaguely resembles Peter Parker) in a slightly different location than the earlier Green Goblin fight, but with identical shot language.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I was bitten by a radioactive spider. And for the last two years I've been the one and only Spider- Woman. (then) You guys know the rest. QUICK FLASHES of 1) Gwen banging on a drum set, 2) Gwen’s in a COP UNIFORM being SAVED by Spider-Gwen, 3) Spider-Gw dealing the death blow to the Lizard Monster only for him turn into PETER PARKER as he dies, Gwen, devastated 4) Gw WALKING DOWN THE STREET, ALL ALONE, hands in pockets, and Spider-Gwen fighting Doc Ock in a different COLLIDER ROOM

dialogues.speaker: GWEN, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I joined a band. Saved my dad. I couldn’t save my best friend, Peter Parker. So now I save everyone else. And I don’t do friends anymore. Just to avoid any distractions. And one day this weird thing happened.  75. Gwen wins the fight. Yes! But then a PORTAL opens above h and she's SUCKED IN, her particles becoming HALFTONE -

dialogues.speaker: GWEN, (V.0O)
dialogues.text: .-.and I mean, like, really weird.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gwen EXPLODES IN AN ENERGY BURST OUT OF THE COLLIDER.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I was blown into last week. Literally. I landed in New York. But not my New York. Gwen TUMBLES and CAREENS through a BLUR OF CITY and NIGHT as her MOLECULES SOLIDIFY, TIMELAPSE SHOWING HER TRAVELIN “BACK IN TIME”, then finally coming to rest in - TIMES SQUARE... Gwen slowly stands. Stares at the same Co Kola billboard where Peter found himself earlier. She see FOOTAGE in Times Square of Spider-Man rescuing people fro earthquakes - the same clip we saw earlier in Jefferson's car.

dialogues.speaker: NEWS ANCHOR
dialogues.text: ...this is the second earthquake in the Tri-State area this month. Lucky for these folks, Spider-Man was there to save the day!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gwen gets SPIDER-SENSE, sees Miles, then gets stuck to hi

dialogues.speaker: GWEN, (V.O)
dialogues.text: My Spider-sense told me to head to Visions Academy. I wasn’t sure why until I met you--

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: I like your haircut.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: You don’t get to like my haircut. The sound of GUNSHOTS RINGS through the forest. The GRAD STUDENTS are coming.  76. Gwen fires her shooter and swings away.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Let’s go. Peter swings away. Miles fumbles with web-shooters...

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: How many more spider people are there?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: --Save it for comic-con!--

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: What’s Comic-Con? --As BULLETS HIT, Miles is WEBBED AND PULLED OUT OF FRAME SEQ. 2550 - SUPER-VILLAINS GETTING ANGRY “SGA”

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kingpin sits on the sun deck, slowly and purposefully CLICKING a ballpoint pen. His stare is hard and intense, unfocused.

dialogues.speaker: FLASHBACK
dialogues.text: CUT TO A PORTRAIT of Kingpin with his WIFE and SON hangs an office wall. It’s KNOCKED DOWN when Spider-Man is THRO into frame, against the wall. Kingpin is FIGHTING Spider- it’s BRUTAL.

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN
dialogues.text: You're dead Spider-Man. VANESSA, Kingpin’s wife in the portrait, walks in with th 13 year old son, RICHARD just as KINGPIN is about to deli the death blow to Spider-Man. They can’t believe the leve violence they’re seeing.

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: Wilson, what are you doing? Kingpin TURNS AROUND with BLOOD SPLATTER on his face. He realizes what they've seen.

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN
dialogues.text: Vanessa.  77.

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: Richard, c’mon... Vanessa takes Richard’s hand and FLEES.

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN
dialogues.text: Vanessa! Richard! No! She gets into her car and PEELS OUT. Richard turns around his seat and looks back at Kingpin as they DRIVE AWAY.

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: Don’t look back honey. It’s okay. It’s okay. Richard LOCKS EYES with a devastated Kingpin. Vanessa fli through a stop sign. Her car is T-boned. PRESENT DAY: Kingpin BREAKS the pen in half. Ock swings in, disheveled. Kingpin leans in with MURDEROU EYES. Ock REACTS, WEAPONS DRAWN. A STANDOFF.

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN
dialogues.text: I killed Spider-Man. Why did I just see two more?

dialogues.speaker: DOC OCK
dialogues.text: There's three actually. No this is good, this is very, very good. It means you get what you want. It means my collider works. (almost hypnotic) All we have to do is kill a couple spiders...and the collider will bring your family back...As many families as you want. A tense beat, all wait for Kingpin’s response. He imperceptibly nods to Tombstone, who holsters his guns. T turn and walk out.

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN
dialogues.text: Tomorrow at my collider.

dialogues.speaker: DOC OCK
dialogues.text: (piqued) Our collider. SEQ. 2700 - THERE ARE OTHERS “TAO”  78.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A BUS. INSIDE, Miles and Gwen sit next to each other. Gwe holds the broken goober in her hand. Both want to talk, neither wants to start the conversation. It should feel k of like them side-by-side in class. Peter SNORES in the back seat.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: He broke this?

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Yeah. He’s actually really embarrassed about it. So, just keep it between us, ok?

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: I know where we can make a new one. And we won’t let him break it this time. Gwen and Miles smile at each other. She’s letting Miles o the hook.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: I’m sorry about your friend.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Thanks, Miles. (then, continues) I know how hard this is, to have to figure this stuff out on your own. It’s kinda nice not being the only Spider person around.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Yeah. If you ever decide to do friends again, I could always open up a slot. A beat. Gwen considers.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: I’ll keep you posted. Miles smiles at Gwen. In the back seat, we see Peter is a and listening.

dialogues.speaker: MILES, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Cool. INT. QUEEN’S STREET - NIGHT  79. Peter takes in A SMALL HOUSE. There are CARDS, BOUQUETS, TOYS cluttering the porch. A TEXT BOX onscreen tells us:

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: We should probably go.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Peter, we’re literally on the doorstep.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Bad idea, bad idea, this is a bad idea--

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Just relax. The front door opens a crack, AUNT MAY’S eyes peering out

dialogues.speaker: AUNT MAY
dialogues.text: You guys are all very sweet but no more fans today, please. AUNT MAY’s eyes WIDEN. She steps out onto her porch, stun at the sight of Peter. Isn’t he supposed to be dead? And Peter, isn’t Aunt May dead?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: I’m not ready for this.

dialogues.speaker: AUNT MAY
dialogues.text: Peter...

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Hey Aunt May... So this is going to sound crazy... but I’m pretty sure that I’m from an--

dialogues.speaker: AUNT MAY
dialogues.text: --an alternate dimension.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Yeah. May touches his face in awe. Peter absorbs her touch.

dialogues.speaker: AUNT MAY
dialogues.text: You look tired, Peter.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Well, I am tired.  80.

dialogues.speaker: AUNT MAY
dialogues.text: (notes his physique) And older. And... thicker.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Yeah, I’ve heard that already.

dialogues.speaker: AUNT MAY
dialogues.text: Oh jeez, are those sweatpants?

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Yup. That’s what they are.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: I was there... when it all happened. I am so sorry.

dialogues.speaker: AUNT MAY
dialogues.text: And what dimension are you from?

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Brooklyn. (then) Did Peter have a place where we could make another one of these? Miles shows her the busted doodad. Aunt May regards it...

dialogues.speaker: AUNT MAY
dialogues.text: (re: goober) A goober... Follow me.

dialogues.speaker: BACK YARD
dialogues.text: Aunt May KICKS OPEN A DOOR and leads them to a GARDEN SHE the tidy yard.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Oh yeah, I got one of these too. A little shed where I keep my spider- gear-- --A SPIDER-GRAPHIC begins to glow on the shed's door, whi opens to reveal an ELEVATOR. Aunt May looks at Peter: was YOURS like this? As they enter:

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I mean, this place is pretentious.  81.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --into RIPeter's MASSIVE, SPIDER-MAN MEETS CALATRAVA LAB: Crammed with crime-fighting and science gear, photos, han furniture, not to mention every Spider-branded product in existence. They reach the bottom, fan out, exploring.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Whoa. Dude, was yours anything like this?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Mine was like this, but take away the jeep, the plane... imagine it way smaller. Imagine a futon. I feel sad for this guy. Miles notices one of 616Peter’s costumes... it has a CAPE looks back at Peter slyly, vindicated. Peter finds a PHOTO: RIPeter and MJ, together. Happy. It him hard. Miles notices.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Hey Peter, I think this is a cape. Peter can't help smiling. Gwen, in turn, watches this hap her wheels turning. Miles is looking at the costumes. His reflection, still a off-center. May walks up.

dialogues.speaker: AUNT MAY
dialogues.text: Peter knew how dangerous the job was. But he figured the only one who could stop this guy was Spider- Man.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Kingpin knows we’re coming. We're going to be outnumbered.

dialogues.speaker: AUNT MAY
dialogues.text: Don’t be so sure. May holds out “my name is” stickers. AUNT MAY (CONT’D) You might need these.  82. MILES’ POV: Four sets of eyes open in the shadows. Spider sense rings out EVERYWHERE. Miles GASPS. Gwen SPINS AROUN on high alert. On a SHOCKED Peter, Miles, and Gwen.

dialogues.speaker: AUNT MAY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You think you’re the only people who thought to come here? SOUND OF BLINDS FLICKING OPEN-- SPIDER-MAN NOIR is lit wi venetian blind shadows, a black-and-white figure whose co is inexplicably billowing around him.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: Hey fellas.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Is he in black and white?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Where is that wind coming from? We're in a basement.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: Wherever I go, the wind follows. And the wind, smells like rain.

dialogues.speaker: SOUND OF MACHINE WHIRRING ABOVE. BOOM
dialogues.text: from above.

dialogues.speaker: PENI
dialogues.text: Hi guys! Konichiwa! Hajimemashita yoroshuku? BOOM! SP//dr, Peni’s robot, LANDS BEHIND PENI IN A BADASS SPIDER-POSE.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: This could literally not get any weirder. Spider-Ham walks into the shot next to Peter. Long beat. sticks out his hand for Peter to shake.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-HAM
dialogues.text: It CAN get weirder! I just washed my hands that’s why they’re wet. No other reason. All of their spider senses go off.

dialogues.speaker: ALL SPIDERS
dialogues.text: You're like me.  83. SPIDER-HAM/ SPIDER-MAN NOIR/ PENI PARKER SP/DR comics dro top of Gwen’s-- ULTIMATE SPIDER-MAN CROSSOVER!

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR/PENI/SPIDER- SPIDER-MAN NOIR/PENI
dialogues.text: HAM (STAGGERED) I was bitten by a radioactive My name is Peter Parker/My spider. name is Peni Parker/My name is Peter Porker.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-HAM
dialogues.text: I was bitten by a radioactive pig. Noir DISPATCHES ENDLESS BAD GUYS. A SPIDER in SP//dr’s he BITES Peni’s outstretched hand--

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: In my universe it’s 1933 and I’ma private eye. I like to drink egg creams and I like to fight Nazis. A lot.

dialogues.speaker: PENI, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I am from New York in the year 3145. I have a psychic link with a spider who lives inside my father’s robot, and we’re best friends. Forever.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Sometimes I let matches burn down to my fingertips just to feel something, anything.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-HAM, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I’m a photographer for the Daily Beagle. When I’m not pooching around, I’m working like a dog trying to sniff out the latest story. I frolic and I dance and I do this with my pants-- --BACK LIVE, as Peter interrupts--

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Ok, enough! Peter turns to Noir.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: So, uh, how did you get here?  84.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: Well, it’s kind of a long story. THREE SECOND MONTAGE -- We see the collider explosion, bu this time Noir, Peni, and Ham streak out of the explosion They land in New York. MATCH CUT to them in the hideout.

dialogues.speaker: NOIR
dialogues.text: Maybe not that long. SEQ. 2800 - A PUNCHER’S CHANCE “APC”

dialogues.speaker: PENI
dialogues.text: And now we’re just trying to find a way home.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: The only way home is back through the collider gizmo. The only trouble is--

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-HAM
dialogues.text: --One of us has to stay behind and destroy it.

dialogues.speaker: NOIR/HAM/PENI/GWEN
dialogues.text: I’ll do it.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: No, no, no, you don’t get it.

dialogues.speaker: PENI
dialogues.text: Don’t get what-- They all GLITCH. Real ugly.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: None of you can stay here. If you stay here, you’ll die. I’m the guy who's going to turn it off and I’m going to get you all home before I do. Look, I made a promise. So I have to keep it. They all look at Miles. It’s kind of inspiring, but--

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: --Who are you again?  85. Peter jumps in, immediatley in “music man” sales mode, talking Miles up.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: This is Miles, and he’s going to save the multiverse.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Yeah man.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: This kid can turn himself invisible! Watch this, he can do it... now! Miles struggles to turn invisible but he can’t.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: I can’t do it on command--

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: --He can’t do it on command. But it is cool. Show them the zappy thing, Miles. Once again, Miles tries to show off his power but he can’ it.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: I can’t do it on command--

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: --He can’t do it on command. But he can do so much more, like what else do you do--

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Just those two things--

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: --Just those two things.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Look I’ve seen him in action. He’s got potential. I think he’s gonna get us home. She says it with conviction. Everyone wants to believe it Noir steps forward to prove it out.  86.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: OK, little fella, Kingpin’s gonna send a lot of mugs after ya, I’m talking hard boys, real biscuit boxers. Can you fight them all off at once?

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Well, I, I haven’t actually fought anyone--

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: Surprise attack! Miles tries to fight Noir, but Noir knocks him down. Peni JUMPS IN.

dialogues.speaker: PENI
dialogues.text: Can you re-wire a mainframe while being shot at?

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Can I what?

dialogues.speaker: PENI
dialogues.text: Show me!

dialogues.speaker: NOIR
dialogues.text: Surprise attack! Noir knocks him down again. FAST CUTS NOW --

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Can you swing and flip with the grace of a trained dancer?

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: Can you close off your feelings so you don’t get crippled by the moral ambiguity of your violent actions?

dialogues.speaker: AUNT MAY
dialogues.text: Can you help your aunt create an online dating profile so she can get out of the dang house once in a while?

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-HAM
dialogues.text: Can you float through the air when you smell a delicious pie?

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: What?  87.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Can you be strong?

dialogues.speaker: PENI
dialogues.text: --Ruthless-—-

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: --Disciplined--

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: I don’t know, maybe--

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-HAM
dialogues.text: (makes sound effect of smashing his head) --boing--

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: --Show me some moxie, soldier--

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Above all, no mater how many times you get hit, can you get back up?

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: Because when a Spider-Man is on the floor--

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: --When you think you've given your all--

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-HAM
dialogues.text: --When you think you can’t keep going--

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: --Spider-Man always gets up. BAM! BAM! BAM! Miles is knocked down REPEATEDLY. He LIES THE GROUND.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: You can do this!

dialogues.speaker: ALL SPIDERS
dialogues.text: Get up Miles! Get up!

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Alright guys, cool it...

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: C’mon Miles! Get up!  88. The Spiders watch Miles struggle on the floor. He can’t g up. CONCERNED LOOKS are exchanged. The Spiders gather in a circle to talk, leaving Miles beh

dialogues.speaker: GWEN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Peter, come here. You need to be more honest with yourself about this. He’s not ready, it’s obvious.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: There’s no way. He’s just a kid.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: But if he can’t do this, we have to stay and do it for him.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: He’s looking right at us while we talk about him... A beat, then Peter looks to where Miles was and realizes- The elevator is moving UP.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Miles? Miles? (sheepishly) See that? He can uh, turn invisible... MILES, INVISIBLE, rides the elevator. All the spiders see the shed doors opening way up in the rafters. SEQ. 1690 - LOOKING FOR AARON “LFA”

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WALKING DOWN THE STREET, despondent. Miles lifts up his phone, checks his messages. We hear his parents message:

dialogues.speaker: JEFFERSON, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Miles, what is going on with you? Nobody has heard from you. We don’t know what’s going on. Look, if you’re hiding something from us, you need to come clean. You call me back. Now. Miles PICKS UP SPEED.  89.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miles CLIMBS TO the rooftop across from Aaron's apartment he does we hear audio of a PHONE RINGING and then we see-

dialogues.speaker: RIO
dialogues.text: Aye... he’s not answering me either. Jefferson is on the phone. Rio sits next to him. A CLICK-

dialogues.speaker: UNCLE AARON, (PHONE MESSAGE)
dialogues.text: --It’s Aaron. I'm outta town for a few days. Hit you when I'm back. Peace.

dialogues.speaker: JEFFERSON
dialogues.text: Aaron, it’s Jeff. Look, I need you to call me if you’ve heard from Miles. EXT. UNCLE AARON’S APARTMENT Miles is on the fire escape, he opens a window and climbs calling out for Uncle Aaron.

dialogues.speaker: JEFFERSON
dialogues.text: He has a soft spot for you and we haven’t heard from him. You know I wouldn’t reach out if this wasn’t important. Hope you’re good. cuUT TO, Jeff hanging up the phone, looking pensive. Rio at him. SEQ. 1700 - UNCLE AARON IS THE PROWLER “UAP”

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miles WRITES A NOTE:

dialogues.speaker: MILES, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Dear Uncle Aaron, I gotta do something and I don’t know if I can do it. I’m scared man. I’m just tired of letting everybody down. You’re the only one I can talk to. I just wish you were here.  90. --Miles stops writing when he hears a NOISE on the fire escape. Uncle Aaron? As the figure gets closer, the silhouette becomes clear: PROWLER. Terrified, Miles scrambling to hide. The PROWLER enters -- but FREEZES. Something feels wrong. Remembering, Miles LOWERS HIS SPIDER-MAN mask. PROWLER'S POV: He looks to the sofa, then around the room again, as if sensing something. He pads quietly, towards where Miles is hiding. Miles sits frozen, not daring to breathe. The Prowler is there, inches from Miles' invisible face. Prowler’s PHONE RINGS and he answers.

dialogues.speaker: PROWLER
dialogues.text: Hello, Mr. Fisk. I’ve got the security tapes from the tunnel right here. If the kid’s out there, I'll find him. Prowler lifts his mask, revealing himself as AARON.

dialogues.speaker: UNCLE AARON
dialogues.text: You know me, sir. I don’t ever quit. Miles' eyes go wide. He GASPS and slowly backs away-- ---Aaron's head snaps up at the sound. He looks around th room and puts his mask back on... Aaron sees the blur, following to the window--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --Miles, as Spider-Man DROPS FROM THE LADDER -- Prowler i pursuit, LEAPING FROM THE FIRE ESCAPE. SEQ. 1725 - PURSUIT OF SPIDER-MAN “POS”

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miles RUNS, the Prowler in pursuit on his motorcycle. In the middle of traffic, Miles sees that he seems to hav lost Prowler. But Prowler follows from the rooftops, watc where Miles goes.  91. SEQ. 2850 - HE CAN’T BE A BAD GUY “CBG”

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peni and SP//dr finish making a new goober.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noir lays on the couch, examining a Rubiks Cube. Peni han Peter the new goober. He hangs it around his neck with a lanyard.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: (to Ham) This is purple.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-HAM
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: Blue?

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-HAM
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Has anyone heard from Miles?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Look, he’s just clearing his head. I know the kid. He’s got what it takes. I bet you he’s going to come back through that door recharged and ready to fight. Gwen stares at Peter, not believing a word he’s saying. J then-- --MILES STUMBLES IN, a WRECK. Heaving--

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: My uncle!

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Hey, where have you been, we--

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: My Uncle Aaron, he -- he -- he's the Prowler!

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Ok, slow down. Slow down, Miles.  92.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: He works for Kingpin, he tried to kill me!

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: This is a pretty hardcore origin story. Miles fights tears. The spiders look to Peter -- who does have the slightest idea of what to say.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: It’s okay, it’s okay, we’re gonna figure it out.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Were you followed?

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: No. I don’t think so. But they hear a RUMBLING... and then- SEQ. 2900 - AN EPIC BATTLE “AEB”

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DING DONG! The door bell rings, then-- --CRRAAAAASSSSSHHHHHHH!!! Doc Ock suddenly WALKS IN throu the DOOR. A tentacle shoots out and knocks a tea tray out Aunt May’s hands.

dialogues.speaker: DOC OCK
dialogues.text: Cute place. Real homey.

dialogues.speaker: AUNT MAY
dialogues.text: Oh great, it’s Liv.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: (heartbroken) I guess I was followed.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Oh no...

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Get out of here kid. Miles turns to run through the kitchen but is blocked by Tombstone.  93.

dialogues.speaker: TOMBSTONE
dialogues.text: You messed up big time kid. Very sloppy. Tombstone pushes past Miles and we reveal SCORPION behind him.

dialogues.speaker: SCORPION
dialogues.text: Mira todas estas arafitas. We see the English text onscreen, along with “*translated from Spanish.” Peter and the spiders get into position.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Let me guess, you’re Scorpion? Well, we're the, uh... Spider-gang.

dialogues.speaker: AUNT MAY
dialogues.text: Would you mind taking this outside?

dialogues.speaker: NOIR
dialogues.text: We don’t pick the ballroom we just dance. Doc Ock sees the GOOBER on Peter’s person.

dialogues.speaker: DOC OCK
dialogues.text: Oh, I think I’1ll be taking that. Her tentacles reach out towards Peter and everyone leaps action. It’s a TEN PERSON FIGHT in a TINY QUEENS LIVING R Scorpion CORNERS MILES, who defends himself with couch cushions!

dialogues.speaker: SCORPION
dialogues.text: Ninoto dale.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Preparate a miror. A man stupid pillows! The couch cushions are STUCK to his hands and Scorpion ATTACKS. SPDR is there to save him as Miles gets unstuck the cushions. Doc Ock smashes Peter into the ceiling. Aunt May swings her baseball bat at Tombstone and knocks out the front door, onto the street.

dialogues.speaker: AUNT MAY
dialogues.text: I said take it outside!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The goober comes loose and Miles goes after it.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: I got it!! Miles chases after the key but is thrown against the wall Gwen webs it away from Doc Ock but Scorpion knocks it out her hand. Noir catches it but glitches, dropping it. Miles continues to chase after the key as it is kicked ar the room. He finally grabs it when his spider-sense goes Suddenly, the Prowler crashes in through the window, land in front of Miles. Peter webs the goober out of Miles’ ha

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: I got this buddy. (to Prowler) Leave the kid alone! Peter and Prowler fight and struggle for the goober.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: No, no, no. No! Peter kicks Prowler off himself and out through the wall the street.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: You gotta go, man. Just then, SP//dr and Doc Ock slam into Peter and all are knocked out the front of the house into the street. SEQ. 2910 - EXTERIOR EPIC BATTLE “EEB”

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BATTLE is now on the rooftops and smashing out of the front windows, moving out into the neighborhood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SIRENS in the air. Jefferson races through the streets.

dialogues.speaker: POLICE RADIO, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: .--All vehicles in the area, we have a disturbance involving multiple spider... people?  95.

dialogues.speaker: JEFFERSON
dialogues.text: (into radio) Yeah, on my way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miles gets up out of the rubble, the goober in his hand. PROWLER DIVES RIGHT AT HIM claws-first! Miles dives out o the way. The Prowler instantly regroups and comes at Mile again, relentless. He swipes with his CLAWS, narrowly missing Miles.

dialogues.speaker: PROWLER
dialogues.text: Give me that thing! Miles races through the house, the Prowler in pursuit. Th face off, the KITCHEN TABLE between them.

dialogues.speaker: PROWLER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Don't be stupid, kid. Hand it over, now-— --Prowler SWIPES DOWN, DESTROYING the table-- Miles races up the stairs, Aaron close behind. He grabs Miles' LEG but Miles kicks him away, continuing upstairs the HOLE SP//dr blasted through the roof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miles scrambles up through the hole onto the roof -- but before he can swing away Prowler LANDS in front of him. M is TRAPPED~

dialogues.speaker: PROWLER
dialogues.text: Nowhere left to run. A standoff. Miles pulls off his mask...

dialogues.speaker: PROWLER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: ..-Miles?

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Uncle Aaron. Aaron takes off his mask as well.

dialogues.speaker: UNCLE AARON
dialogues.text: Oh no no no no... Miles’ eyes WELL UP.  96.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: (barely a whisper) Please Uncle Aaron. Kingpin calls Aaron from his car below, watching the standoff.

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN
dialogues.text: --Prowler, what are you waiting for? Finish it. A long beat...and then Aaron pulls down Miles’ mask, and backs away, his hands up. He smiles at Miles when-- --BANG! KINGPIN FIRES. Aaron’s eyes go wide as he falls b Kingpin has shot him. Kingpin AIMS AT MILES but Peter swings in and KNOCKS King down.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: (to Miles) Get out of here! Miles scoops up Aaron and swings away. Jefferson arrives and sees two people swinging across the street. SEQ. 2920 - AARON’S DEATH “ARD”

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miles kneels over Aaron.

dialogues.speaker: UNCLE AARON
dialogues.text: ..-Miles...

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: .--Uncle Aaron. This is my fault. Aaron takes Miles’ hand. Shakes his head “no.”

dialogues.speaker: UNCLE AARON
dialogues.text: No Miles. I’m sorry. I wanted you to look up to me. I let you down, man, I let you down. You’re the best of all of us, Miles. You’re on your way. Just... keep going... just keep going... With Miles at his side, he DIES. Miles can't believe it.  97.

dialogues.speaker: JEFFERSON, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Hands up! Put your arms up now! Miles stands but doesn't turn around. Puts up his arms.

dialogues.speaker: JEFFERSON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Turn around. Miles instinctively CAMOUFLAGES. Jeff looks around, unabl see him.

dialogues.speaker: JEFFERSON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey! Hey!!! But as he advances, he sees who the dead man is.

dialogues.speaker: JEFFERSON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aaron? Aaron. No... No. Jeff touches his brother's face, and recoils. ON MILES, CAMOUFLAGED, seeing the grief hit his father. Jeff's face HARDENS. He turns on his shoulder radio.

dialogues.speaker: JEFFERSON, (INTO WALKIE)
dialogues.text: All units. I want an APB on a new Spider-Man. As Jefferson slumps we PUSH IN ON MILES, visible to us th way a heat signature is behind a jet engine. But we can clearly see he's DEVASTATED. SEQ. 3050 - WE NEED A PLAN “NAP” INT. VISIONS ACADEMY - MILES’ DORM - EVENING Miles is TEARING THROUGH HIS ROOM in an emotional, teenag rage. He pushes all of his homework and books off his des and his SKETCHBOOK falls open on the floor, the artwork h did with Aaron staring up at him. Miles picks it up and THROWS IT out the window. The notebook FLIES back through window like a boomerang, Miles catches it. Peter’s head pops into the window. He climbs into the roo followed by the other spiders. Peter walks up to Miles an puts a hand on his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Hey, bud. You okay? Miles takes a deep breath, holding back tears.  98.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: We've all been there. For me it was my Uncle Ben.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: For me it was my Uncle Benjamin.

dialogues.speaker: PENI
dialogues.text: For me it was my father.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: For me it was my best friend.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-HAM
dialogues.text: Miles, the hardest thing about this job is you can’t always save everybody.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Look, it was my fault. You wouldn’t understand.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Miles, we're probably the only ones who do understand-- --A JIGGLING AT THE DOOR.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Oh no... It SWINGS OPEN-- --Revealing Ganke, entering with his headphones on, playi music. Ganke crosses to his desk and we reveal the SPIDER TEAM PLASTERED TO THE WALL IN BACK OF HIM. Oblivious, Ganke grabs his Spider-Ham comic and starts to read, foot on his desk. He takes his headphones off and s in his chair, now FACING THE SPIDER-MEN, but with his com blocking his view.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (whispered) That way! That way! --and the SPIDER-MAN CLUMP moves to the ceiling and onto wall in back of him. Ganke then crosses back--

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Other way! Other way! --and the SPIDER-MAN CLUMP shifts back to where it was.  99. Ganke sits. Lifts up his comic and lowers the comic to se SPIDER-HAM. Spider-Ham grins.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Hey there!

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-HAM
dialogues.text: Do animals talk in this dimension? Cause I don’t wanna freak him out-- --Ganke FAINTS to the ground, unconscious. TIME CUT -- Miles puts Ganke into the bed. When MILES tur around, Gwen’s climbing through the window, only Peter remains in the room.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: What’s going on?

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Bye Miles.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Miles, I came to say goodbye.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: We can say goodbye at the collider.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: You're not getting it. You’re staying here.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: I need to be there. So you can all go home. Miles picks up the goober off his desk.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: They are going home, Miles. I’m the only one staying. A long beat.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: You're taking my place...? If you stay here you'll die.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: I’m doing what needs to be done. I just wanted you to hear it from me.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: What about MJ?  100.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: (looks at the floor) Not everything works out, kid. I need the goober. (then) Please don’t make me take it from you. Peter steps forward. Miles FURIOUS--

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: That’s not fair! You've gotta tell them I can do this!

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: It wasn’t their decision.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: I gotta make Kingpin pay! You have to let me make him pay!

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Miles, you’re gonna get yourself killed.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: But I’m ready, I promise-- Peter does a combo move, nearly knocking Miles to the gro if Peter wasn’t there to catch him. Miles HANG DOWN, held by PETER.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Then venom strike me right now, or turn invisible on command so you can get past me. Miles TRIES to do what he’s saying but it only makes Pete seem even more right. Outside the window, the other spiders listen to their conversation.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Look, I know how much you want this, kid.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: Poor little guy. Back inside the dorm room, Peter puts Miles down.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: But you don’t have it yet.  101. Peter WEBS a desk chair under Miles, spins the chair, and webs him into a cocoon, and takes the key.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I’m sorry. Peter can’t look at him.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: When will I know I’m ready-- --Peter WEBS his mouth.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: You won’t. It’s a leap of faith. That’s all it is Miles. A leap of faith. Peter jumps out of the window and swings away with the ot spiders. Miles, tied securely to his desk chair, watches sadly fro his window. SEQ. 3000 - I AM SPIDER-MAN “IAS” INT. VISIONS ACADEMY - MILES’ DORM - NIGHT TIMES PASSES. Miles stares ahead. --KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK. He is jolted out of his self-pity by KNOCK at his door -- someone that can help him! Miles SCOOCHES towards the door excitedly, inch by inch on the chair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JEFFERSON is in the hallway in full uniform.

dialogues.speaker: JEFFERSON
dialogues.text: Miles! Miles, it’s your Dad. Jefferson sees a shadow moving under the door - it STOPS.

dialogues.speaker: BETWEEN MILES AND JEFFERSON
dialogues.text: Miles, now a couple of feet from the door, FREEZES.

dialogues.speaker: JEFFERSON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Please open the door.  102. Miles starts to slowly BACK AWAY from the door, inch by i

dialogues.speaker: JEFFERSON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Miles, I can see your shadow moving around. Miles STOPS again.

dialogues.speaker: JEFFERSON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Yeah. Ok, I get it. I get it. Still ignoring me. Look, can we talk for a minute? Something happened... Jefferson struggles with what to say.

dialogues.speaker: JEFFERSON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Look sometimes, people drift apart, Miles. And I don’t want that to happen to us, ok? Look, I know I don’t always do what you need me to do or say what you need me to say, but I’m... I see this...this spark in you. It’s amazing, it’s why I push you. But it’s yours and whatever you choose to do with it, you'll be great. Miles’ eyes are wide and soulful. He rests is head agains the door, so close.

dialogues.speaker: JEFFERSON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Look call me when you can, ok? I love you. (then) You don’t have to say it back though. Jefferson still waits for an “I love you” back. When he doesn’t get it, he taps the door farewell and walks down hall. Miles CLOSES HIS EYES and we sit with him for a beat. Miles’ hands visibly RELAX as his venom strike starts to crackle to life on his hands - using this memory is how h learning to control his powers. Miles uses a mini VENOM STRIKE to BREAK FREE from the cha restraints. He CAN’T BELEIVE IT. GANKE BOLTS UP, dazed - but sees nothing -- REVEAL Miles has turned invisible and is exiting the building. He’s IN CONTROL.  103. SEQ. 3010 - MILES RISES UP_“MRU” EXT. AUNT MAY’S BACKYARD - NIGHT QUICK CUTS a hand opening the padlock. The LIGHTS in Pete hideout flooding on to REVEAL AUNT MAY sitting in wait, sipping tea.

dialogues.speaker: AUNT MAY
dialogues.text: Took you long enough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Clouds gather. Total coincidence. PUSH IN on a gargoyle n the building's very tippy top. We don't see ANYONE. Until... Lightning REVEALS a CAMOUFL MILES. With each strike, we FLASH to Miles’ journey to get to th top of the building. FLASH! Miles exits the subway. FLASH Miles approaches the Spider-man suits in the Spidey hideo FLASH! Miles SPRAY-PAINTS A SUIT.

dialogues.speaker: JEFFERSON, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I see this spark in you. It’s amazing. Whatever you choose to do with it you’ll be great.

dialogues.speaker: RIO, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Our family doesn’t run from things.

dialogues.speaker: UNCLE AARON, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: You’re the best of all of us, Miles. You’re on your way. Just keep going.

dialogues.speaker: MILES, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: When do I know I’m Spider-Man? BACK ON MILES-- Moving closer and closer to the edge.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: You won’t. That’s all it is, Miles... a leap of faith. Miles walks to the edge of the roof, the wind buffeting.. and LEAPS! The camera is UPSIDE DOWN. Miles isn't falling through frame. He's RISING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CUT TO Miles SPRAY PAINTING his new uniform. DISINFECTING MASK. PUTTING BABY POWDER ON THE JOINTS.  104. BACK LIVE, Miles is OUT OF CONTROL, flailing. Miles shoot web upwards between his legs...The webbing STICKS to a building... Miles SNAPS on web-shooters as Aunt May watches.

dialogues.speaker: AUNT MAY
dialogues.text: Made ‘em myself. They fit perfectly. Miles BEGINS TO SWING. He moves with purpose through New York, slides between taxis, across windows-- He swings up on top of the Brooklyn Bridge and catches hi breath. In the distance, we see Fisk Tower. He’s ready.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN
dialogues.text: SEQ. 3075 - STORMING THE TUNNELS “STT”

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Spiders exit a bus. We see the WHOOSH of SPIDER-PEOPL swinging up to the top of a crane like a SWAT TEAM, until looking down at the PENTHOUSE, staring into SKYLIGHTS.

dialogues.speaker: PENI
dialogues.text: Kingpin has a private elevator entrance from his penthouse to the collider below.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: Didn't count on having an audience. INT. KINGPIN’S PENTHOUSE - ENTRANCE SALON - NIGHT GUESTS mill beneath MASSIVE BANNERS depicting SPIDER-MAN

dialogues.speaker: ALL SPIDERS
dialogues.text: You've got to be kidding me. Kingpin stands. COPS and GUARDS surround him. He takes th dais, waves to the crowd.  105.

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN
dialogues.text: Thank you, it’s nice to be with you this evening to celebrate Spider- Man. He and I were very close. He was always a favorite of my son. Kids love Spider-Man, right? Still do.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: What a pig.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-HAM
dialogues.text: (offended) I'm right here.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: Hold on, get a load of how the waiters are dressed. It’s in poor taste but-- ANGLE ON THE WAITERS: They are dressed like tacky SPIDER- with bowties. SPIDER-MAN NOIR(CONT’D) It can't be that easy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON OUR SPIDER-TEAM, moving through the fundraiser. Noir carries a serving tray, while Peter and Gwen push a LARGE CART which is made from a CONTORTED, CRAWLING SP//dr.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: It’s that easy.

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN
dialogues.text: And I just want to thank Mary Jane Parker for being here this evening. Our prayers are with you Mrs. Parker. As Kingpin mentions MJ, Peter spots her in the crowd. Uh A beat.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: (gasps)

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Pay attention! It’s not the same MJ, Peter.  106.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: I’m sorry, I'll be right back--

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: No! Peter! Come here here! Trust me, I’ve been there. You gotta move on buddy.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: This will just take one sec. Let me just-- Oh! --He turns his cart toward MJ. He bumps into MJ.

dialogues.speaker: MJ
dialogues.text: Hello.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Oh wow.

dialogues.speaker: MJ
dialogues.text: Um, I just wondered if we could have some more bread at table twelve.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Yeah! I’m just, I’m really sorry... ON GWEN, horrified.

dialogues.speaker: MJ
dialogues.text: Oh, don’t be sorry. It’s just bread.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: No, I wasn’t there for you when you needed me.

dialogues.speaker: MJ
dialogues.text: Mmmhmm.. .

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: And I didn’t even try.

dialogues.speaker: MJ
dialogues.text: That's fine. I should really get going--

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: I know I could do better if I just had another chance to give you... (realizing) ...the bread that you deserve.  107.

dialogues.speaker: MJ
dialogues.text: Are you ok?--

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Ma’am we'll take care of that bread right now.

dialogues.speaker: MJ
dialogues.text: It’s been nice, uh, talking to you.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: For you they should fill this place up with fresh bread. Gwen ushers Peter towards the kitchen.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: You alright, man?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Yeah. Totally.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: OK good cause we are not getting any bread. The tables start to WOBBLE, people look down at their dri which now have ripples a la Jurassic Park.

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN
dialogues.text: I’m just sorry my family can’t see what we're doing tonight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doc Ock is hard at work on a computer, prepping the colli She hits a button--

dialogues.speaker: COMPUTER VOICE
dialogues.text: Initializing primary ignition sequence. SEQ. 3090 - WHERE THEY FIGHT “WIF”

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wilson Fisk walks with purpose down a hallway. He walks p two guards and disappears into his office. As he passes, the guards are WEBBED. Reveal the spiders o the ceiling. Spider-Man Noir WEBS their eyes.  108.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: (creepy whisper) Sleeeeeeep. INT. FISK’S OFFICE Noir SHOOTS at a panel in the elevator, allowing them to swing down the elevator shaft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kingpin enters with Tombstone and sees a waiting Doc Ock.

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN
dialogues.text: Start the sequence. Doc Ock NODS and a scientist takes a piece of hair from Vanessa’s brush to use as a DNA sample.

dialogues.speaker: SCIENTIST 1
dialogues.text: Uploading Vanessa Fisk and Richard Fisk DNA sequence.

dialogues.speaker: SCIENTIST 2
dialogues.text: Beginning scan for dimensional matches. Doc Ock fires the collider, a computer monitoring and cal the collider’s status.

dialogues.speaker: COMPUTER VOICE
dialogues.text: Secondary ignition in 5... 4... 3... 2... 1. The COLLIDER FIRES just as--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --the spiders arrive! They make their way to the top of t THUNDERING collider, moving like a military unit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DIMENSIONAL QUAKING occurs, worse than before, people PANICKING -- the BROOKLYN BRIDGE flickers, pedestrians SCREAM. Jefferson HELPS a CIVILIAN and sees FISK TOWER flicker in distance.  109.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They crest the hill and stare at the beam and the beginni of DIMENSIONAL COLLAPSE. ON GWEN AND PETER. Peter is nervous. So is Gwen.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Peter, you don’t have to stay behind. I can do it.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: It’s okay. I’ve made up my mind. They all swing out to the ceiling of the collider room.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I'll put the goober in and take over the beam. After you’re gone, I'll blow it up. He starts to crawl towards the panel.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Good luck guys. Peter REACHES the panel. Peter is about to put the overri key into the panel-- When the Spider’s get SPIDER SENSE--

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: They know we're here. DOC OCK SLOWLY EMERGES out of the ceiling. Real creepy li

dialogues.speaker: DOC OCK
dialogues.text: Nice to see you again, Peter. Doc Ock slams Peter onto the ceiling of the collider room The spiders rush to help Peter, but are ATTACKED by Kingp thugs. SEQ. 3100 - BATTLE AT THE COLLIDER “BAC”

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: [NOTE --- from here out we’re watching an increasingly psychedelic depiction of DIMENSIONS COLLIDING, and the Spideys have to do their job as it happens]  110. They BATTLE, the spiders fending off bad guys while glitching! As the CAMERA ROVERS the Spiders INTERACT. Noir glitches and is caught under fire. PENI comes to sav him.

dialogues.speaker: PENI
dialogues.text: I got you covered! --Gwen comes FLYING IN, sliding down a GANTRY CRANE-- She sees Scorpion coming towards her.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Ugh, these guys are the pits. Peni and SP//dr jump in to fight Scorpion. On the ceiling, Peter struggles against Ock. He tries to reinsert the goober but he puts it in the wrong way.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Why is this always difficult? Doc Ock drags him away from the panel.

dialogues.speaker: DOC OCK
dialogues.text: Where are you going, Peter? As she pulls Peter in...

dialogues.speaker: DOC OCK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Any last words?

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Can I get a minute to think about it? Do you have a pen?

dialogues.speaker: DOC OCK
dialogues.text: Goodbye Peter Parker. Suddenly, one of her tentacles PUNCHES her in the face. P reacts to Doc Ock punching herself.

dialogues.speaker: DOC OCK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Who did that? She looks around. REVEAL Miles turning visible as he FLIES TOWARDS DOC OCK.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Miles?  111.

dialogues.speaker: DOC OCK
dialogues.text: Spider-Man? He Shoots WEBBING, knocking her back as she releases her on Peter. Miles catches him and they both land on the ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Wow Miles! You’re doing it on command!

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: About time right? MULTIPANEL -- The Spiders react to seeing Miles again.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-HAM
dialogues.text: Hey, look who’s here!

dialogues.speaker: PENI
dialogues.text: Miles!

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: You figured it out.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: I love you! I am so proud of you! Do I want kids? Doc Ock breaks free of her restraints and CHARGES them.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh yeah. I forgot about her. As they fight, they all notice a box raising up towards t beam.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Well that doesn’t look promising.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: No, it doesn’t.

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE OBSERVATION ROOM
dialogues.text: Vanessa and Richard start to flicker into existence as Kingpin watches from the observation room.

dialogues.speaker: SCIENTIST 1
dialogues.text: I’ve got genetic matches! Hold on... It’s too risky!

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN
dialogues.text: Shut up and turn it up!  112.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Spiders all battle bad guys as the room descends into more chaos.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: On your left! On your right! I got 5 o'clock, 3 o’clock, 2 o’clock! Every direction!

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: On your right! On your right! CAMERA flies back up through the building to the ball roo People are PANICKING. Jefferson is running against the ti on his phone.

dialogues.speaker: JEFFERSON
dialogues.text: Get to a shelter! I’1l be right there! INSIDE A HOSPITAL, furniture multiplies, the occupants panicking. Rio is on the phone with Jefferson.

dialogues.speaker: RIO
dialogues.text: Vamo senor. I’ve tried the school, but I can’t get through!

dialogues.speaker: OUTSIDE ON THE STREET
dialogues.text: The VISIONS bridge “quakes”, cars split into multiple versions of themselves, people run, screaming.

dialogues.speaker: BACK IN THE COLLIDER ROOM
dialogues.text: CLUSTER BUILDINGS burst through the portal. The spiders continue to BATTLE as things get CRAZY.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Guys are you seeing this?! Peter, Miles, and Gwen meet up on top of one of the colli guns. They look out over the chaos that is happening in t room.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Looks like our dimensions are coming to us.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: It does look cool though, right?  113.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: We gotta get back up there. Shouldn't be too hard-- Their Spider-senses go off - they turn around just as Ock THROWS a BUS at them! NOIR and TOMBSTONE have a hand-to-hand fight.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: Is that all you got? You gonna fight or you just bumping gums you hard boiled turtle slapper? Noir PULLS A car on top of Tombstone. IT EXPLODES (COMIC

dialogues.speaker: BURST CARD
dialogues.text: Scorpion has SP//dr pinned down. Peni struggles to break but Scorpion starts to destroy SP//dr, pulling off and destroying the robot’s limbs. As Scorpion goes to attack Peni again, an ANVIL SLAMS ont Scorpion’s head. Reveal that Ham has dropped it on him.

dialogues.speaker: SCORPION
dialogues.text: Puerco? What are you, some kind of silly cartoon?

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-HAM
dialogues.text: You got a problem with cartoons? Scorpion and Ham fight hand-to-hand combat. HAM IS FREAKI INSANE AT FIGHTING. Ham knocks Scorpion down and before h can get up, Noir grabs his tail and swings him around. As lets go and Scorpion flies towards Peni, she grabs one of SP//dr's detached arms and smashes Scorpion with it. He’s out. SPIDER-HAM (CONT’D) Ohhh did THAT feel like a cartoon?

dialogues.speaker: ON MILES, PETER, GWEN AND OCK
dialogues.text: Gwen and Miles fight Doc Ock, tag-teaming. Gwen is IMPRES by Miles. Suddenly one of Ock’s tentacles hits Gwen hard and she fa back towards the beam.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Gwen!!  114. Miles flies after Gwen, barely grabbing her. (Note: refer “Gwen falls” panels) He SWINGS back up with a recovering Gwen.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: I like your suit.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Thanks. I made it myself. --Miles SHOOTS a web strand back at Peter. Peter GRABS the web strand and PULLS IT, giving GWEN SUPERSPEED.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: That was adorable team! Now hold on tight! Gwen FLIES in-- They all hit her 1-2-3. Ock FLIES BACK from the impact and smashes onto a buildin Furious, she races back towards them.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Buckle up guys, this is going to take a while. Doc Ock is HIT by a rogue 18 wheeler.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Alright, never mind. Let’s end this thing. Miles TAKES CONTROL. He’s the quarterback now.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Guys, I got it.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: I'll go. I'm the one with the goo- Miles holds up the goober.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh you gotta be kidding me.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Don’t watch the mouth. Watch the hands.  115. He shoots a web and swings off through the chaos in the collider room.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Miles!

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Be careful! ON MILES as he heads to the panel, doing his own version Blonde Peter’s swing-crawl-flip to the panel.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: That was crazy. Back on Peter and Gwen.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Ah we taught him that right?

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: I didn’t teach him that. And you definitely didn’t. Peter and Gwen swing off to join Miles. ON PENI, NOIR and HAM As SP//dr SPARKS and DIES, Peni takes out her SPIDER. She turns to look at the destroyed robot, tears in her ey Noir steps up, puts his hand on her shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: NOIR
dialogues.text: You okay? (tenderly) C'mon... She jumps on Noir’s back and with Ham, they swing away to join Miles at the panel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside is the MESS OF WIRES AND EQUIPMENT RIPeter saw. Mi INSERTS the goober.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Guys! I got control of the beam! Get up here!

dialogues.speaker: COMPUTER VOICE
dialogues.text: Alert! Quantum polarity has been reversed.  116.

dialogues.speaker: IN OBSERVATION ROOM
dialogues.text: Kingpin’s looks up and sees Miles at the panel as the oth spiders join him. Kingpin, ENRAGED, SLAMS DOWN on the control panels in fro of him, SMASHING THE WINDOWS of the Observation Room.

dialogues.speaker: IN THE COLLIDER ROOM
dialogues.text: The room SHAKES, inter-dimensional quakes ROCKING THE COLLIDER ROOM AND ALL OF BROOKLYN.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Guess this is it.

dialogues.speaker: PENI
dialogues.text: Well, nice to know we’re not alone. Right?

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Yeah. They all look around at each other. They want to go home...but part of them wants to stay. Miles punches a code into the keypad and twists the goobe

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: I got the portal open. You first Peni. She smiles.

dialogues.speaker: PENI
dialogues.text: Thank you, Miles. From both of us. Peni JUMPS into the beam. Miles punches in another code a looks to Noir.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-MAN NOIR
dialogues.text: I, uh, love you all. (holds up a Rubik’s cube) I’m taking this cube thing with me. I don’t understand it, but, I will. Noir lets go and DISAPPEARS. Spider-Ham hold up a huge mallet. He’s near tears.

dialogues.speaker: SPIDER-HAM
dialogues.text: I want you to have this. It’ll fit in your pocket.  117. Miles takes it. SPIDER-HAM (CONT’D) That’s all folks. Ham JUMPS.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Is he allowed to say that? Legally? Miles turns to Gwen. A beat. Awkward. Just like the classroom, but...

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Do I get to like the hairdo now? Gwen laughs.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: You know I’m older than you. Fifteen months, but it’s pretty significant if you ask me.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Well, Einstein said time was relative, right?

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: (laughs ) Nice. She turns away, uncomfortable with the moment. Miles hold out his hand.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Friends? A long beat. Gwen grabs his hand and holds it.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: Friends.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Cool.

dialogues.speaker: GWEN
dialogues.text: See you around Spider-Man. She elegantly leaps into the beam. Miles turns to Peter.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Your turn.  118.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: (hesitant) Yeah yeah right... Peter looks down and hesitates. HE’S SCARED TO GO-- They're both hit with a surge of SPIDER-SENSE. Miles and Peter look down to see Kingpin has left the observation r and is now leap-frogging his way across buildings towards them.

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN
dialogues.text: You’re not going ANYWHERE! Peter assesses the situation.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: I'll hold him off, you shut this down! Peter jumps away from the panel, going towards Kingpin. M is SURPRISED.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Peter, that wasn’t the deal!

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: Push the green button! Do not wait for me! But Peter is LEAPING AWAY ALREADY, SWINGING, when A WEB S

dialogues.speaker: HIM AND YANKS HIM BACK TO-
dialogues.text: MILES, on the other end of the WEB!

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Peter, you gotta go home!

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: This guy could kill you! I can’t let Spider-Man die.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: (defiant) Neither can I.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: It’s OK.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Yeah, it is ok.  119. Miles DROP KICKS Peter and holds him suspended over the portal. It looks exactly like when Peter challenged Miles his dorm room before tying him up. MILES (CONT’D) (with empathy) You gotta go home man.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: (suddenly sad and scared) How do I know I’m not gonna mess it up again?

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: You won't.

dialogues.speaker: PETER
dialogues.text: (realizing) Right. It’s a leap of faith. Peter takes his hand off Miles hand, readying himself. Mi DROPS Peter into the portal. Peter smiles as he disappears into the portal.

dialogues.speaker: PETER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Not bad, kid. Miles pulls his mask back down and turns to face the approaching Kingpin. THEY FACE OFF.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Kingpin! Kingpin SMASHES the building, causing a ripple of glass t fly towards Miles. Miles backflips out of the way. Kingpin pulls out a gun and Miles WEBS it away. MILES (CONT’D) Nope! Sorry. That’s cheating! He starts to advance when a subway train suddenly speeds heading towards the panel. Miles shoots a web at the trai and hitches a ride. MILES (CONT’D) Adios! SEQ. 3150 - INTER-DIMENSIONAL FIGHT “IDF”

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miles lands on the side of the train and looks around to locate the panel.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: I gotta get to that button. Just then, the window on the train breaks and a pair of h pulls Miles in. It’s Kingpin!

dialogues.speaker: MAZE.
dialogues.text: Miles flickers in and out invisibility as he evades Kingp punches. But Kingpin predicts Miles’ next spot and lands hit. Miles tries to venom strike but it fizzles out.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: Oh no...

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN
dialogues.text: Not so easy doing it on your own is it? Kingpin grabs Miles around the neck and slams him against wall.

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I can’t wait to kill one more Spider-Man. An ENRAGED KINGPIN is about to deliver the death blow to Miles, just like he did to RIPETER when-- --Vanessa and Richard appear and they DON’T RECOGNIZE KINGPIN. MULTIPLE VANESSA AND RICHARDS now GLITCH IN AND

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: What are you doing? Where am I?

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN
dialogues.text: What...

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA 2
dialogues.text: Wilson...

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: (sadly) Is this what you want man?  121.

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA 3
dialogues.text: What are you doing? You stay away from us.

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Vanessa? Vanessa! Richard!

dialogues.speaker: RICHARD
dialogues.text: What’re we doing here?

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA 4
dialogues.text: I don’t know Richard...

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN
dialogues.text: Vanessa it’s me. You know me!

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA 5
dialogues.text: ...we’re leaving now. Vanessa and Richard are frightened. They don’t recognize Kingpin. They see him about to kill Spider-Man and they r through the door behind them.

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN
dialogues.text: Don’t go! Stay with me! Please! Kingpin reacts and runs after them, dropping Miles. He en the train car and finds it empty... his family has gone b into the multiverse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miles climbs out of one of the windows and onto the side the speeding train. He looks around and locates the panel is about to web away when Kingpin BURSTS through the side the train and lands in front of Miles. He’s LOST EVERYTHI but he’s not losing the fight.

dialogues.speaker: KINGPIN
dialogues.text: You're not stopping this. Not today.

dialogues.speaker: MILES
dialogues.text: I am stopping this! Right now!

dialogues.speaker: IN THE OBSERVATION ROOM
dialogues.text: Jefferson walks in and examines the control room. It’s trashed as a result of the interdimensional event going o He looks out the front of the room and witnesses the chao taking place in the collider room.  122. The train car whizzes by with Kingpin and Miles fighting top of it, in clear view of Jefferson.

dialogues.speaker: JEFFERSON
dialogues.text: (into his walkie) I need back up! He only hears static.

dialogues.speaker: IN THE COLLIDER ROOM
dialogues.text: Kingpin and Miles fight, Kingpin with renewed fury. Kingp throws Miles off the train and they continue fighting as fall, drowning in Sienkowicz/Kirby Psychedelia. Kingpin and Miles CRASH into the Brooklyn Bridge. A dazed Miles shakes off the collision on the bridge, his mask off. He staggers to his feet. Kingpin is already standing, unsteady but still dangerous. Kingpin and Miles square off, two exhausted boxers. Kingp suddenly reaches out. He brutally shoves Miles to the ground.
